parameters:
\SE[17]So you still want to go...! \SE[14]You're such a stubborn
person...!!
I decided to bring a stuffed animal with me!

\SE[15]No, it's also your job to protect the house. \SE[1]I'm
staying home with mom, watching over it.

Please take care of the bento. Your father is somewhere at the
village's water source.
\SE[37]Good morning... \SE[2]Huh? Dad, did you already leave?

Good morning. It seems like you're still half asleep, your dad
left already.

\SE[4]That late riser dad of mine? \SE[15]Money really changes
people...
スライドスピード = def

Humans... don't change so suddenly. That person forgot their
bento box.

\SE[8]Dad, you must be hungry.... \!\SE[0]Hmm...\. Alright, I'll
deliver it then. \!\SE[4]He's somewhere in the village, right?
スライドスピード = def
Can I rely on you? Geez... He's such an hopeless person...

Well then, take care. Your father. It seems like he's working
somewhere at the water source.
\SE[0]Hmm... Somewhere at the water source in the village, huh?
スライドスピード = def
スライドスピード = def

\SE\SE[2]Good morning. \SE[2]Since Aisha isn't here today...
should I take you with me?
I decided to bring my stuffed animal with me!
\SE[13]Make sure to escort me properly, okay?

\SE[15]No, it's your job to protect the house too. \SE[17]Mom and
I are on duty guarding it.
